attributes.action: stop the blatant age discrimination present in the benefits system.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For example, if you receive Contribution-Based Jobseeker's Allowance in 2008/2009 you are paid £47.95 per week if you are aged 24 or under, but if you are aged 25 or over you are paid 60.50 - an extra £12.55 per week.

How is it that a 24 year old has lower living costs than a 25 year old?
